responses: what can I do for you?

patterns: i have trouble swallowing pills. can my prescription be made into a liquid?
responses: some medications are available in liquid formulations. many other medications can be made into a liquid formulation by a compounding pharmacist. be sure to let your health care provider know you have difficulty swallowing medications. they should be able to accommodate you.

patterns: i've been taking respa-ar for allergies. i can't seem to get it refilled. will it be back on the market soon?
responses: try claritin-d which is located behind the pharmacy counter. i'm not sure if or when respa-ar will be back on the market.
